faqAnswer1: Forstna is a digital platform offering various coupons and discounts from local businesses.
faqQuestion2: How do I create an account?
faqAnswer2: You can create an account by signing up through our registration page.
faqQuestion3: How do I use a coupon?
faqAnswer3: Simply present the coupon code at the time of purchase or apply it online as instructed.
faqAnswer4: Yes, you can contact our support team via the contact form on our website.

faqAcc.accountQuestion1: I forgot my password. What should I do?
faqAcc.accountAnswer1: You can reset your password by clicking on 'Forgot Password' on the sign-in page and following the instructions.
faqAcc.accountQuestion2: How can I update my account information?
faqAcc.accountAnswer2: Log in to your account and navigate to the 'Account Settings' page to update your information.
faqAcc.accountAnswer3: Yes, you can request to delete your account by contacting our support team through the contact form.
faqAcc.accountQuestion4: How do I verify my email address?
faqAcc.accountAnswer4: After signing up, you should receive a verification email. Click on the link in the email to verify your address.

faqBill.billingAnswer1: We accept major credit cards, PayPal, and other popular payment methods.
faqBill.billingQuestion2: How can I view my billing history?
faqBill.billingAnswer2: You can view your billing history by logging into your account and navigating to the 'Billing' section.
faqBill.billingQuestion3: Can I update my payment information?
faqBill.billingAnswer3: Yes, you can update your payment information by going to the 'Payment Methods' section in your account settings.
faqBill.billingQuestion4: What should I do if I see an incorrect charge?
faqBill.billingAnswer4: If you see an incorrect charge, please contact our support team immediately through the contact form, and we will assist you.

faqTech.techQuestion1: How can I report a technical issue?
faqTech.techAnswer1: You can report a technical issue by contacting our support team through the contact form on our website or by emailing us directly.
faqTech.techQuestion2: What should I do if I encounter a bug?
faqTech.techAnswer2: If you encounter a bug, please provide as much detail as possible, including screenshots and steps to reproduce the issue, and send it to our support team.
faqTech.techQuestion3: How can I get help with using the platform?
faqTech.techAnswer3: For help with using the platform, you can check our help center or contact our support team for personalized assistance.
faqTech.techQuestion4: Can I schedule a call with technical support?
faqTech.techAnswer4: Yes, you can schedule a call with our technical support team by filling out the request form on our website.
